data.title: Themed Beatles Tour of Liverpool
data.meta_description: For a Beatles tour of Liverpool, Liverpool Beatles Tours offers Beatles tours from 3 hours to all day Beatles tours. To see The Beatles Liverpool, come with us on a private, personalised Beatles tour in Liverpool.

Liverpool Beatles Tours - Established 2004

Part of the C and I Travel Ltd. Group

ABOUT THE COMPANY

Liverpool Beatles Tours Ltd. has been providing personalised Beatles tours in Liverpool since 2004.

We have welcomed fans from all over the world: USA, Canada, South America, Australia, Europe, South Africa and Asia.

Our aim is to give you the tour you deserve.

Terms and Conditions

LATEST NEWS

NEW TOURS ADDED

New VIP tours, plus Specialist tours like WW2 and Looking for Lennon

AIRPORT PICKUP AVAILABLE

THEMED BEATLES TOURS IN LIVERPOOL

THE VIP 4 HOUR THEMED BEATLES TOUR OF LIVERPOOL

In our John Lennon Tour, Paul McCartney Tour, George Harrison Tour and Ringo Starr Tour, we will take you through the life and career of your chosen Beatle, by taking you to their birthplace, homes, schools and significant locations around Liverpool to walk in their footsteps and go where most Beatles tours donât go.

We'll take you to the homes, schools and famous places around the Beatles' Liverpool linked to your favourite Beatle, or choice of themed tour.

If you want to find out more about John, Paul, George or Ringo, then we have the tour for you.

You can take a Long and Winding Road through Paul McCartneyâs life; a Sentimental Journey into Ringoâs life; Imagine John Lennonâs childhood in Liverpool or find out Something about George Harrisonâs birthplace, homes and schools.

Donât just take our word for it - read our Beatles tour testimonials

McCartneyâs Merseyside Tour

Take a trip to Paulâs birthplace and via Paulâs homes and schools, from north Liverpool to Speke where he met George and then to Forthlin Road where he and John wrote many songs. Find out more

George Harrison Tour

We will take you from Johnâs birthplace, via Newcastle Road and Mendips, Dovedale School and Quarry Bank and into Lennonâs Woolton, where he grew up and the Quarrymen began. Find out more

On Georgeâs tour, we will go from his home where he was born, as well as see Dovedale School and the Liverpool Institute, plus his homes in Speke and Woolton.

Ringo Starr Tour

On Ringoâs tour, you will see his birthplace at Madryn Street and Admiral Grove where he grew up, plus a wander around The Dingle, and see his schools and venues that he played.

The Fab 104 Tour

Do you want to know how they went from being The Quarrymen to the Fab Four, and the many musicians who played a valuable part in the story.

Let author David Bedford take through the main musicians in the story from his book, The Fab one hundred and Four (left).

If you want to go into the history of the musicians from The Quarrymen to the Fab Four, then we have a tour for that too!

And then, if that isnât right for you, just design your own tour!

All admission fees are included in the total price.

Pete Best and Stuart Sutcliffe Tours

If you want to find out more about two people who have been called âThe Fifth Beatleâ. Find our more about them on this special tour.

Discover the roots of The Beatles on this Quarrymen tour, where you will see how and where the group was formed, and how it became the genesis of The Beatles.

The Quarrymen Tour
